duck: Ratchet (Transformers), a character in the franchise Transformers
Ratchet (device), a mechanical device that allows movement in only one direction

ratchet definition: a mechanism that consists of a bar or wheel having inclined teeth into which a pawl drops so that motion can be imparted to the wheel or bar, governed, or prevented and that is used in a hand tool (as a wrench or screwdriver) to allow effective motion in one direction only.

Interview: University of Guam's Ron McNinch on North Korea's nuclear threats
U.S.; China has provided military aid and training to Venezuela
Interview: Danny O'Brien of the Electronic Frontier Foundation
Lobby groups oppose plans for EU copyright extension

wiki.text:
'Ratchet' may refer to:
* Ratchet (device), a mechanical device that allows movement in only one
  direction
* Ratchet, a tool also known as a socket wrench
* Ratchet (instrument), a music instrument

In 'film and television':
* Ratchet (''Transformers''), a character in the franchise Transformers
* Ratchet (''Robots''), a character in the film Robots
* Ratchet, a character in the [[Widget the World Watcher]] television series
* Ratchet, a character in the [[Red Lantern Corps]] DC Comics series

In 'games':
* Ratchet (''Ratchet & Clank''), a video game character
* Ratchet, a town in [[World of Warcraft]]

In 'other':
* Ratchet, a financial derivative also known as cliquet option
wiki.title: ratchet
